snippet: A program by the Martha Graham company at the Joyce takes the audience from the loony to the horrific.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews season-opening performance by the Martha Graham Dance Company at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: A program by the Martha Graham company at the Joyce takes the audience from the loony to the horrific.
